block_comment: This block of code handles the initialization of various status, index and signal values when the negedge of Frame is triggered and 'il' equals 16. It makes use of an always block which is triggered on the negative edge of a signal 'Frame'. It consequently sets the 'shift_statusL', 'P2S_status', 'sign_statusL' to zero, resets the index values 'il', 'index_rjL', 'pL', 'jL', 'index_coeffL', sets 'flagL' to one, and sets 'yl' and 'ul' to 40'h0 (40-bit zero).
